author: Vairo, Leonardo, Bishop of Pozzuoli, d. 1603
title: De fascino libri tres, auctore Leonardo Vairo Beneuentano ordinis S. Bendicti ... in quibus omnes fascini species, & causae optima methodo describuntur, & ex philosophorum ac theologorum sententijs eleganter explicantur: nec non contra praestigias, impost
